fixes.name: End DATE - 1day
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR EndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
VAR weekday = WEEKDAY(EndDate)
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    weekday = 1, EndDate - 2,
    weekday = 2, EndDate - 3,
    EndDate - 1
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau DATEPART('weekday', [Parameters].[End Date]) with DAX WEEKDAY(EndDate) and converted the CASE statement to SWITCH(TRUE(), ...). The parameter [End Date] is mapped to SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]). Date adjustments are performed by subtracting days from the selected parameter date.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
